entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM NDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -0.7°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 2.
